articles.title: Tamannaah Bhatia tests coronavirus positive, admitted to a hospital in Hyderabad - India Today
articles.description: Tamannaah Bhatia, who is currently shooting for a web series in Hyderabad, has tested coronavirus positive. She has been admitted to a private hospital.
